thread.title: DMACC Hosts Author

author: KWBG
title: DMACC Hosts Author
text:
DMACC Hosts Author Posted on 21 October 2015 by KWBG 
BOONE, Iowaâ€”The Boone Campus of Des Moines Area Community College will be one of the sites visited by award winning author Emil St. John Mandel. Mandel, author of is the 2015 winner of the Arthur C. Clarke award for science fistion and finalist for a National Book Award. His visit to the Boone Campus Theatre on Thursday morning at 11:45 is part of the One Book One College One Community program. The event is free and is open to the public. Leave a Reply You must be logged in to post a comment. Boone Municipal, IA
